Interface ColorObject

public interface ColorObject

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getHex()
          Gets the ColorObject's color as a hex value, standard for web development.
 void setHex(java.lang.String hex)
          Sets a ColorObject to a specific color using hex format, standard for web development.
 

Method Detail

getHex

java.lang.String getHex()
Gets the ColorObject's color as a hex value, standard for web development.

Returns:
String corresponding to the hex value for the color, following RGB format, e.g.
  • 000000 for black
  • FFFFFF for white
  • FF0000 for red
  • 0000FF for blue
Since:
org.openntf.domino 1.0.0

setHex

void setHex(java.lang.String hex)
Sets a ColorObject to a specific color using hex format, standard for web development.

Parameters:
hex - String corresponding to the hex value for the color, following RGB format, e.g.
  • 000000 for black
  • FFFFFF for white
  • FF0000 for red
  • 0000FF for blue
Since:
org.openntf.domino 1.0.0
